string.text: This clan is non-historical. It is impossible to create a historical clan because of the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region.
Volodar Rostyslavych
Representing the Volodar Rostyslavych family. The coat of arms is a hypothetical reconstruction* based on the seal of close relative of Igor Vasylkovych.
Rostyslav Volodarovich
Representing the Rostyslav Volodarovich family. The coat of arms is a hypothetical reconstruction* based on the seal of close relative of Igor Vasylkovych.
Vasylko Rostyslavych
Representing the Vasylko Rostyslavych family. The coat of arms is the seal of his son Knyaz Igor Vasylkovych.
Druhyi Bych Pasadnik
This clan is non-historical. Representing Halych boyars in Druhyi Bych city. The clan's coat of arms is the coat of arms of Halych principality.

This clan represents the Jatvingian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The coat of arms is a cross from the Kalozha church, built in the second half of the 12th century. The church still exists today and represents a separate architectural school.
Vaŭkavysk*

This clan represents the Jatvingian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is Belarusian sign of family.

This clan represents the Jatvingian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is Jatvingian folk sign.
Usłonim*

This clan represents the Jatvingian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is Belarusian sign of purity.

This clan represents the Jatvingian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is Belarusian sign of sun.

This clan represents the Lithuanian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is a variation of the Baltic Moon (Mēness) symbol.
Nalša
Upytė
Usiasłaŭ II the Seer
Representing the Usiasłaŭ II the Seer and Rahvałod Usiasłavavič families. The coat of arms is the seal of Knyaz Usiasłaŭ II the Seer.
Hleb Usiasłavič
Representing the Hleb Usiasłavič family. The coat of arms is the seal of his brother Knyaz Rahvałod Usiasłavavič.
Śviatasłaŭ Usiasłavič

Representing the Śviatasłaŭ Usiasłavič family. The coat of arms is a hypothetical reconstruction based on the symbiosis of his family's coats of arms and the later coat of arms of the town of Polatsk.
Raścisłaŭ Usiasłavič
Representing the Raścisłaŭ Usiasłavič family. The coat of arms is a hypothetical reconstruction based on the symbiosis of his family's coats of arms and the later coat of arms of the town of Polatsk.
Davyd Igorovich

Representing the Davyd Igorovich family. The coat of arms is a hypothetical reconstruction* based on the seal of Davyd Igorovich's grandfather and modern coat of arms of the Volodymyr-Volhynia district.
Jarasłaŭ Jarapołčyč
Representing the Jarasłaŭ Jarapołčyč family. The coat of arms is the seal of Knyaz Jarasłaŭ Jarapołčyč.
Sviatoslav Davydovich
Representing the Sviatoslav Davydovich family. The coat of arms is the seal of Knyaz Sviatoslav Davydovich.
Belz Pasadnik
This clan is non-historical. Representing knyaz Davyd Igorovich's pasadnik in the town of Belz. The clan's coat of arms is the coat of arms of Volhynia.
Mechyslav Davydovich

Representing the Mechyslav Davydovich family. The coat of arms is a hypothetical reconstruction* based on the seal of Davyd Igorovich's grandfather and modern coat of arms of the Volodymyr-Volhynia district.
Karšuva

This clan represents the Žemaitian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is a variation of the Baltic Moon (Mēness) symbol.
